trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce il supporto in fase di progettazione per <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: ConnectionsZoneDesigner provides a design-time representation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control with a menu to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property for the convenience of the page developer.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionsZoneDesigner fornisce una rappresentazione in fase di progettazione di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controllo con un menu per accedere il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>insieme e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>proprietà per agevolare lo sviluppatore della pagina.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: It is the only zone designer that does not support designer regions.
trans-unit.target: È la finestra di progettazione solo zona che non supporta le aree della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls uses links to create connections instead of a drag-and-drop user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: In questo modo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controlli utilizzano collegamenti per creare connessioni anziché un'interfaccia di trascinamento e rilascio utente (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property both appear on the verbs menu of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>insieme e il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>proprietà vengono entrambi visualizzati nel menu dei verbi di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, when selected, provides a selection of color schemes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, se selezionato, fornisce una selezione di combinazioni di colori.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> check box, when selected, displays the contents of the control as it would appear in the browser; the control will be empty until a connection is made.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>casella di controllo, se selezionata, consente di visualizzare il contenuto del controllo come viene visualizzata nel browser, il controllo sarà vuoto finché non viene stabilita una connessione.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from ConnectionsZoneDesigner to support a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control as with any other control designer.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ereditare da ConnectionsZoneDesigner per supportare un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controllare come con qualsiasi altra finestra di progettazione di controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the markup that renders the control.
trans-unit.target: È possibile eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>metodo per modificare il markup che esegue il rendering del controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> with a custom scheme.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile sostituire il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>raccolta a cui aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>con uno schema personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di automatica predefiniti schemi di formattazione da visualizzare nel **formattazione automatica** la finestra di dialogo per il controllo associato in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to get a predefined collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà formati automatici esegue l'override dell'implementazione di base per ottenere una raccolta predefinita specifica per la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: A predefined <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> with a default ConnectionZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: Predefinito <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> con uno schema ConnectionZone predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il markup usato per rappresentare il controllo in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the markup to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il markup per rappresentare il controllo in fase di progettazione.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Associa la finestra di progettazione specificata <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"></xref> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone"> </xref> controllo associato alla finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Hides a preset group of properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Nasconde un gruppo predefinito di proprietà in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The PreFilterProperties method overrides the parent method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> properties in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo PreFilterProperties esegue l'override del metodo padre per nascondere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A>proprietà nella finestra di progettazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is because the properties in question are not rendered by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls and are therefore not relevant.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo le proprietà in questione non viene eseguite da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>controlli e sono pertanto non rilevanti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the set of properties associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>del set di proprietà associato al controllo.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
